Forty - nine - year - old Richard Danz uprooted his family from Elk County , Pennsylvania to Matthews , North Carolina days after FBI agents searched his St. Marys in August 2012 .
Danz was scheduled to be sentenced Monday afternoon by a federal judge in Erie .
